info.name: F1 Management API
info.description: API documentation for the F1 database based on table schemas.

item.name: Get a list of all cars

request.description: This endpoint returns a car record matching the provided ID
This endpoint updates a car record in the system.
This endpoint deletes a car record from the system.

item.name: Get a list of all drivers

request.description: This endpoint allows you to get a list of all drivers in the system.
This endpoint allows you to create a new driver in the system.

item.name: Get a list of all events

request.description: This endpoint allows you to get a list of all events in the system.

response.name: Successful response

request.description: This endpoint allows you to create a new event in the system. You need to provide the name, date, track_id, and event_type. The `id` field is read-only and will be generated by the system.

item.name: Get a list of all teams

request.description: This endpoint allows you to get a list of all teams in the system.

response.name: Successful response

request.description: This endpoint allows you to create a new team in the system. You need to provide the official name, short name, headquarters, and team principal. The `id` field is read-only and will be generated by the system.

response.name: Successfully created a new team
response.body:
{
  "id": 1,
  "official_name": "Oracle Red Bull Racing",
  "short_name": "Red Bull",
  "headquarters": "Milton Keynes, United Kingdom",
  "team_principal": "Christian Horner"
}

response.name: Successful Response
response.body:
{
  "id": 1,
  "official_name": "Oracle Red Bull Racing",
  "short_name": "Red Bull",
  "headquarters": "Milton Keynes, United Kingdom",
  "team_principal": "Christian Horner"
}

response.name: Team successfully updated
response.body:
{
  "id": 1,
  "official_name": "Oracle Red Bull Racing",
  "short_name": "Red Bull",
  "headquarters": "Milton Keynes, United Kingdom",
  "team_principal": "Christian Horner"
}

item.name: Get a list of all tracks

request.description: This endpoint allows you to get a list of all tracks in the system.

response.name: Successful response
response.body:
[
  {
    "id": 1,
    "name": "Circuit de Monaco",
    "length_km": 3.34,
    "continent": "Europe",
    "country_id": 1,
    "description": "The Circuit de Monaco is a street circuit laid out on the city streets of Monte Carlo and La Condamine around the harbour of the principality of Monaco."
  },
  {
    "id": 1,
    "name": "Circuit de Monaco",
    "length_km": 3.34,
    "continent": "Europe",
    "country_id": 1,
    "description": "The Circuit de Monaco is a street circuit laid out on the city streets of Monte Carlo and La Condamine around the harbour of the principality of Monaco."
  }
]

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Circuit de Monaco",
  "length_km": 3.34,
  "continent": "Europe",
  "country_id": 1,
  "description": "The Circuit de Monaco is a street circuit laid out on the city streets of Monte Carlo and La Condamine around the harbour of the principality of Monaco."
}

request.description: This endpoint allows you to create a new track in the system. You need to provide the name, length in kilometers, and continent. The `id` field is read-only and will be generated by the system.

response.name: Successfully created a new track
